description: deallocate_ip_address and deallocate_port log a message, but don't log the exception. Johannes  brought this up during a review and suggested we run down why these exceptions are not logged.
title: quantum manager eats exceptions during deallocation

commit 29d021ba9063a9db16b29a327af9581b58a8e2f7
Author: Aaron Lee <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Feb 29 17:07:39 2012 -0600

    Fixes lp931801 and a key_error
    
    The quantum manager should log the errors it
    receives from quantum, even when charging ahead
    with the deletes.
    
    update: pep8 and less some testing code
    update: checking log is called and consolidate
            error messages
